sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import logoheader from "../assets/images/logo-small-transparent.svg"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import entype from "../assets/images/image 12.png"; import mobilelogo from "../assets/images/Logotype.png"; import google from "../assets/images/Google.png"; import { useGoogleLogin } from "react-google-login"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { loginUser, getUser } from "../redux/actions/user"; import { getFaceBookData } from "../services/service"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; const Header = ({ get }) => { const history = useHistory(); const onSuccess = (googleUser) => { let profile = googleUser.getBasicProfile(); history.push("/owner"); }; const { signIn, loaded } = useGoogleLogin({ onSuccess, }); const loginFb = async () => { window.FB.login( function (response) { if (response.authResponse) { getCurrentUserInfo(response); } else { console.log("Auth cancelled."); } }, { scope: "email" } ); }; const getCurrentUserInfo = async (response) => { const fbResponse = await getFaceBookData(response.authResponse.accessToken); console.log("fb", fbResponse); history.push("/owner"); }; const loginGoogle = () => { signIn(); }; const onSignIn = (googleUser) => { // console.log("s", googleUser); let profile = googleUser.getBasicProfile(); console.log("pr", profile); }; const userLogin = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); history.push("/owner"); }; return (
{/* Header start here */}
{/* */}
    {/*
    • */}
  • Manage Facility
  • Facility
  • Sign Up
  • Login
{/* Header End here */} {/* Login Modal here */}
Log In

Forgot password?{" "} Reset password

or Log In with

Don't have an account? Sign up for free.

{/* Signup Modal here */}
Sign Up

or Sign Up with

By signing up you accept the{" "} terms and conditions and{" "} privacy policy

{/* Forgot Modal here */}
Forgot your password?

No worries! Please enter the email address you used when signing up and we'll send you instructions on how to set a new password.

Suddenly remembered your password?{" "} Log In{" "}

{/* Reset pass Modal here */}
Check your inbox

The instructions for resetting your password have been sent to{" "} john.j@gmail.com

Didn't get the email? Send another email.

Whoops, typo in your email? Fix it.

); }; const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => { return { login: (data) => dispatch(loginUser(data)), get: (data) => dispatch(getUser(data)), }; }; export default connect(null, mapDispatchToProps)(Header);
